Package DAO

Class CustomerQuery

java.lang.Object
DAO.CustomerQuery
public abstract class CustomerQuery extends Object
This is the CustomerQuery class. This class provides methods for performing database operations related to customers. It includes methods for selecting, inserting, updating, and deleting customer records.

  • Method Details

    • insert

      public static int insert(String name, String address, String postal, String phone, String createDate, String createdBy, String lastUpdated, String lastUpdatedby, int divisionId) throws SQLException
      This is the insert method. This method inserts a new customer into the customer table in the database.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the customer.
      address - The address of the customer.
      postal - The postal code of the customer.
      phone - The phone number of the customer.
      createDate - The date and time the new customer was created.
      createdBy - The user that created the new customer.
      lastUpdatedby - The Date and time the customer record was last updated.
      lastUpdated - The user that last updated the customer record.
      divisionId - The ID of the division associated with the customer.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected by the insertion should be 1 if successful 0 if not.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs during the database operation.

    • delete

      public static int delete(int id) throws SQLException
      This is the delete method. This method deletes a customer record from the customers table based on the customer ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer to delete.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected by the deletion.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs during the database operation.

    • update

      public static int update(int customerIDS, String nameS, String addressS, String postalS, String phoneS, String createdateS, String createdbyS, String lastUpdatedS, String lastUpdateByS, int divisionIDS) throws SQLException
      This is the update method. This method updates an existing customer record based on the customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerIDS - The ID of the customer to be updated.
      nameS - The updated name of the customer.
      addressS - The updated address of the customer.
      postalS - The update postal code of the customer.
      phoneS - The update phone number of the customer.
      createdateS - The date and time the customer record was created.
      createdbyS - The user that created the customer record.
      lastUpdatedS - The date and time the customer record was last updated.
      lastUpdateByS - The user that last updated the customer record.
      divisionIDS - The ID of the division associated with the customer.
      Returns:
      The number of rows affected by the customer 1 if successful 0 if not.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a SQL exception occurs during the database operation.
